snippet: A man who confessed to robbing and killing Eastern Michigan University wide receiver Demarius Reed has been sentenced to 18 to 30 years in prison....

headline.print_headline: Gunman Gets 18-30 Years for Demarius Reed Slaying
headline.main: Gunman Gets 18-30 Years for Demarius Reed Slaying

lead_paragraph: A man who confessed to robbing and killing Eastern Michigan University wide receiver Demarius Reed has been sentenced to 18 to 30 years in prison.
